Perceptor:

"You will meet him as soon as he end a meeting that he has with=
 his allies" said Perceptor, he used his comm link  "Chameleon... come here=
... " and speaking with Bullet " I'll told you your punishment, Bullet, as =
soon as Chameleon comes"

  Bullet leaned=
 forward placing a hand on the surface of the desk to resiter
  his signatu=
re. Now at least he knew that he was a recent transfer to this
  unit which=
 explained why he didn't know any of the bots he'd met.

  He didn't rememb=
er anything about a large bot named Typhon, it must have
  happened while h=
e was enraged. "I understand sir." He said lucky that this
  was only a sla=
p on the wrist. "I'll try not to let it happen again." He sat
  back again =
after the scanner took his frequency, "Unless I have a Maximal at
  the tip=
s of my horns." For some reason he fealt the need to boast about his
  abil=
ities, he was one sure SOB (Son Of a Bot)

  There was one other question t=
hat needed answered before he could fully
  accept what was going on. "When=
 can I expect to meet Darkfate?" he asked
  wanting an assesment of the lea=
der before going into battle.
